info.name: ESMS Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for ESMS Laravel 12 Multi-Tenant SaaS application - Superadmin & Tenant Management Systems

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Test School",
    "email": "school@testschool.com",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "domain": "testschool",
    "subscription_plan_id": 1,
    "contact_email": "admin@testschool.com",
    "contact_phone": "+1234567890",
    "address": "123 School Street",
    "city": "Test City",
    "state": "Test State",
    "country": "Test Country",
    "postal_code": "12345",
    "admin_first_name": "John",
    "admin_last_name": "Doe",
    "admin_email": "john.doe@testschool.com",
    "admin_phone": "+1234567891"
}

{
    "name": "Updated Test School",
    "contact_email": "updated-admin@testschool.com",
    "contact_phone": "+1234567899",
    "address": "456 Updated Street",
    "city": "Updated City",
    "state": "Updated State",
    "country": "Updated Country",
    "postal_code": "54321"
}

{
    "name": "Updated Test Plan",
    "description": "Updated test subscription plan",
    "price": 59.99,
    "currency": "USD",
    "billing_cycle": "monthly",
    "features": [
        "Updated Feature 1",
        "Updated Feature 2",
        "New Feature 3",
        "New Feature 4"
    ],
    "user_limit": 150,
    "storage_limit_gb": 10,
    "is_active": true,
    "is_default": false,
    "sort_order": 5
}

{
    "name": "Website URL",
    "field_key": "website_url",
    "type": "url",
    "label": "School Website",
    "placeholder": "https://example.com",
    "help_text": "Enter your school's official website URL",
    "validation_rules": "nullable|url",
    "options": null,
    "is_required": false,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 10
}

{
    "name": "Updated Website URL",
    "field_key": "website_url",
    "type": "url",
    "label": "Official School Website",
    "placeholder": "https://yourschool.edu",
    "help_text": "Please enter your school's official website URL",
    "validation_rules": "required|url",
    "options": null,
    "is_required": true,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 5
}

{
    "school_name": "Test Elementary School {{$timestamp}}",
    "email": "admin{{$timestamp}}@testelemschool.edu",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "domain": "testelemschool{{$timestamp}}",
    "address": "789 Education Avenue, Learning City, Education State, Education Country - 12345",
    "contact_person": "Jane Smith",
    "tagline": "Excellence in Elementary Education",
    "principal_name": "Dr. Robert Johnson",
    "establishment_year": 1995,
    "student_capacity": 250,
    "school_type": "primary",
    "board_affiliation": "State Education Board",
    "website": "https://testelemschool.edu"
}

query.description: Search by name, email, or roll number
Filter by payment status (paid, pending, overdue)
Search in title, description, vendor name
Filter by exam type (unit_test, half_yearly, annual, olympiad)
Filter by grade (A+, A, B+, B, C+, C, F)
Search in title, author, or description
Filter by category (Academic, Administrative, Events, Holiday, Emergency)
Filter by priority (low, medium, high, urgent)
Filter by target audience (all, students, parents, teachers, staff)
